00046 static SPIDRV_HandleData_t  ezradioSpiHandle;
00047 static SPIDRV_Handle_t      ezradioSpiHandlePtr = &ezradioSpiHandle;
00048 
00049 #if (defined _EZR32_HAPPY_FAMILY)
00050 static SPIDRV_Init_t        ezradioSpiInitData = SPIDRV_MASTER_USARTRF1;

00056 
00063 void ezradio_hal_GpioInit( GPIOINT_IrqCallbackPtr_t ezradioIrqCallback, bool enablePTI )
00064 {
00065 #if (defined _EZR32_HAPPY_FAMILY)
00066   (void)enablePTI;
00067 #endif
00068 
00069    GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef) RF_USARTRF_CS_PORT, RF_USARTRF_CS_PIN, gpioModePushPull, 1 );
00070 
00071    /* Setup enable and interrupt pins to radio */
00072    GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef) RF_SDN_PORT, RF_SDN_PIN, gpioModePushPull,  0 );
00073    GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef) RF_INT_PORT, RF_INT_PIN, gpioModeInputPull, 1 );
00074 
00075    /* EZR32HG family uses hard wired PTI interface from the radio to the board controler */
00076 #if !(defined _EZR32_HAPPY_FAMILY)
00077    if (enablePTI)
00078    {
00079      /* Setup PRS for PTI pins */
00080      CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_PRS, true);
00081 
00082      /* Configure RF_GPIO0 and RF_GPIO1 to inputs. */
00083      GPIO_PinModeSet((GPIO_Port_TypeDef)RF_GPIO0_PORT, RF_GPIO0_PIN, gpioModeInput, 0);
00084      GPIO_PinModeSet((GPIO_Port_TypeDef)RF_GPIO1_PORT, RF_GPIO1_PIN, gpioModeInput, 0);
00085 
00086      /* Pin PA0 and PA1 output the GPIO0 and GPIO1 via PRS to PTI */
00087      GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 0, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00088      GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 1, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00089 
00090      /* Disable INT for PRS channels */
00091      GPIO_IntConfig((GPIO_Port_TypeDef)RF_GPIO0_PORT, RF_GPIO0_PIN, false, false, false);
00092      GPIO_IntConfig((GPIO_Port_TypeDef)RF_GPIO1_PORT, RF_GPIO1_PIN, false, false, false);
00093 
00094      /* Setup PRS for RF GPIO pins  */
00095      PRS_SourceAsyncSignalSet(0, PRS_CH_CTRL_SOURCESEL_GPIOH, PRS_CH_CTRL_SIGSEL_GPIOPIN15);
00096      PRS_SourceAsyncSignalSet(1, PRS_CH_CTRL_SOURCESEL_GPIOH, PRS_CH_CTRL_SIGSEL_GPIOPIN14);
00097      PRS->ROUTE = (PRS_ROUTE_CH0PEN | PRS_ROUTE_CH1PEN);
00098 
00099      /* Make sure PRS sensing is enabled (should be by default) */
00100      GPIO_InputSenseSet(GPIO_INSENSE_PRS, GPIO_INSENSE_PRS);
00101    }
00102 #endif //#if !(defined _EZR32_HAPPY_FAMILY)
00103 
00104    if (NULL != ezradioIrqCallback)
00105    {
00106        /* Register callback and enable interrupt */
00107        GPIOINT_CallbackRegister( RF_INT_PIN, ezradioIrqCallback );
00108        GPIO_IntConfig( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef) RF_INT_PORT, RF_INT_PIN, false, true, true );
00109    }
00110 
00111    return;
00112 }
00113 
00117 void ezradio_hal_SpiInit( void )
00118 {
00119    ezradioSpiInitData.bitRate   = 8E6;
00120    ezradioSpiInitData.csControl = spidrvCsControlApplication;
00121 
00122    SPIDRV_Init( ezradioSpiHandlePtr, &ezradioSpiInitData );
00123 
00124    return;
00125 }

00130 void ezradio_hal_AssertShutdown(void)
00131 {
00132   GPIO_PinOutSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef) RF_SDN_PORT, RF_SDN_PIN);
00133 }
00134 
00138 void ezradio_hal_DeassertShutdown(void)
00139 {
00140   GPIO_PinOutClear( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef) RF_SDN_PORT, RF_SDN_PIN);
00141 }
00142 
00146 void ezradio_hal_ClearNsel(void)
00147 {
00148   GPIO_PinOutClear( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef) RF_USARTRF_CS_PORT, RF_USARTRF_CS_PIN);
00149 }
00150 
00154 void ezradio_hal_SetNsel(void)
00155 {
00156   GPIO_PinOutSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef) RF_USARTRF_CS_PORT, RF_USARTRF_CS_PIN);
00157 }

00164 uint8_t ezradio_hal_NirqLevel(void)
00165 {
00166   return GPIO_PinInGet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef) RF_INT_PORT, RF_INT_PIN);
00167 }

00174 void ezradio_hal_SpiWriteByte(uint8_t byteToWrite)
00175 {
00176   SPIDRV_MTransmitB(ezradioSpiHandlePtr, &byteToWrite, 1);
00177 }

00184 void ezradio_hal_SpiReadByte(uint8_t* readByte)

00186   SPIDRV_MReceiveB(ezradioSpiHandlePtr, readByte, 1);

00196 {
